title: 2022 Giving
description: In 2022, Barr provided nearly $140 million in support, through $130 million in grants and $10.2 million in direct charitable expenses.

slices.label: Arts & Creativity
slices.description: In 2022, Arts & Creativity had a total grantmaking budget of $30.6 million. Of this, $29.2 million supported grantmaking and $1.4 million supported direct charitable expenses.

slices.label: Climate
slices.description: In 2022, Climate had a total grantmaking budget of $35.8 million. Of this, $33.2 million supported grantmaking and $1.6 million supported direct charitable expenses.

slices.label: Education
slices.description: In 2021, Education had a total grantmaking budget of nearly $40 million. Of this, $33.6 million supported grantmaking and $6.5 million supported direct charitable expenses.

slices.label: Sector Effectiveness
slices.description: In 2022, Sector Effectiveness had a total grantmaking budget of $6.5 million. Of this, $6 million supported grantmaking and $417,072 supported direct charitable expenses.

slices.label: Special Initiatives
slices.description: In 2022, Special Initiatives had a total grantmaking budget of $25.6 million. Of this, $25.3 million supported grantmaking and $281,958 supported direct charitable expenses.

slices.label: Other
slices.description: In 2022, Barr awarded $1,000,000 for organizational development, matching gifts, and membership/sponsorship grants.
